title: Binance Warns of Rising Clipper Malware Attacks Targeting Cryptocurrency Users
description: Cryptocurrency exchange Binance is warning of an "ongoing" global threat that's targeting cryptocurrency users with clipper malware with the goal of facilitating financial fraud.
